resources.string: The name MRMCD is a registered trademark of MRMCD e.V. The MRMCD 2024 design was crafted by Leif Niemczik. Used with permission.

MRMCD 2024 logo: Land in sight. A ship is heading for an iceberg. On the ship, two ducks imitate the Titantic scene at the railing. A whale swims in the water. In front of the ship, an enter rows in a small boat. A wave foams.
